title: riot often say games need balance,but Nasus,akali,yasuo,veigar,pike op like shit

replies.body:
>Op shit

>Nasus, Veigar, Akali, Yasuo

Pick one, because **none** of those four are OP. Pyke is the only one I **might** give you as being OP, but he's more just on the strong side than actually OP.

You won't get anyone on your side saying shit like nasus and veigar are op in this meta.


Even more so without explaining why they are "op"
Buddy if you claim Nasus and all of those other champs (besides pyke) are op and not saying why you think so, then none of us can help besides saying “get gud lul”
akali fog is so op that she can not be target even under turret,ridiculous
